titles.title: Alaska Native Self-Governance in Housing Demonstration Program Act
To authorize the Alaska Native Self-Governance in Housing Demonstration Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1711)

bill.summary:
8/2/2007--Introduced.
Alaska Native Self-Governance in Housing Demonstration Program Act - Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish and implement an Alaska Native Housing Assistance Demonstration Program according to the provisions of this Act.
